title: No mystery chest.
body: I thought that if you already owned riot Kayle then we would get a mystery skin, but i got just the icon and no mystery skin meanwhile everyone is getting riot Kayle. Its bad enough that your giving people who bought the skin with money something that's half the price of the skin they purchased.

replies.body: The icon and other gifts are being sent out individually.  There are a lot accounts to gift per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), so hang tight!  You'll get the goods!
dude the gifts come separetly from one another today u might get the icon and tomorrow the mystery
